title: Luxury black & gold business website for Gold Laser Cutting (Etawah) with local SEO and lead CTAs

requirements.text: Create a single-page, premium luxury marketing website for the business "Gold Laser Cutting" (Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, India) with a consistent black-and-gold theme, elegant typography, and a mobile-first responsive layout.

quotes: Create a premium, modern, luxury business website.
Theme: Black and Gold luxury theme.
Design: Elegant, professional, mobile-friendly, fast loading.

acceptanceCriteria: Website uses a consistent black + gold luxury palette across all sections (backgrounds, accents, buttons, typography).
All sections are responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints.
Pages/sections load without layout shift and remain performant (lazy-load non-critical images, avoid heavy assets).

requirements.text: Implement the homepage hero section with the exact heading and subheading provided and three primary CTAs: Call Now (tel:7906968141), WhatsApp Now (link to WhatsApp chat for 8126108743), and Get Quote (scrolls to a quote/contact form section).

quotes:
Homepage:
Heading: "Best Gold Laser Cutting Service in Etawah"
Subheading: "5+ Years of Precision Jewellery Laser Cutting Experience"
Buttons:
- Call Now (7906968141)
- WhatsApp Now (8126108743)
- Get Quote

acceptanceCriteria: Hero shows heading exactly: "Best Gold Laser Cutting Service in Etawah".
Hero shows subheading exactly: "5+ Years of Precision Jewellery Laser Cutting Experience".
Call Now button opens the device dialer via tel:7906968141.
WhatsApp Now button opens WhatsApp chat for 8126108743 (using wa.me or equivalent).
Get Quote button scrolls to the Quote/Contact section reliably.

requirements.text: Add an About Us section in English describing 5+ years of jewellery laser cutting experience, advanced laser machines, high precision, fine finishing, and being trusted in Etawah.

quotes:
About Us Section:
Write about our 5+ years experience in jewellery laser cutting.
Mention we provide all types of jewellery cutting using advanced laser machines with high precision and fine finishing.
Highlight that we are trusted in Etawah.

acceptanceCriteria: About Us content is in English and includes: 5+ years experience, advanced laser machines, high precision, fine finishing, trusted in Etawah.

requirements.text: Add a Services section listing all services provided by the user, displayed as premium cards or a clean list with icons, keeping copy in English.

quotes:
Services Section:
- Gold Jewellery Laser Cutting
- All Types of Jewellery Cutting by Laser Machine
- Custom Design Cutting
- Name Cutting
- Pattern Cutting
- Fine Detail Work
- Bulk Order Accepted

acceptanceCriteria: Services section includes all 7 services exactly as listed (English).
Services layout remains readable on mobile and does not overflow.

requirements.text: Add a Gallery section with luxury-styled image placeholders for jewellery cutting samples, using locally stored static images in the frontend public assets.

quotes:
Gallery Section:
Add image placeholders for jewellery cutting samples.

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery renders a grid/carousel of at least 6 sample placeholder images.
Images are served as static frontend assets (not fetched through the backend).
Images are lazy-loaded (where applicable) to support fast loading.

requirements.text: Add a Why Choose Us section containing all six bullet points provided by the user.

quotes:
Why Choose Us:
- 5+ Years Experience
- Advanced Laser Machine
- Perfect Finishing
- Fast Delivery
- Trusted by Local Jewellers
- Affordable Pricing

acceptanceCriteria: Why Choose Us section includes all 6 points exactly as listed.
Section uses a premium, scannable layout (e.g., icon + label) and remains mobile-friendly.

requirements.text: Add a Testimonials section with 3 positive customer reviews (English), presented in a premium card layout.

quotes:
Testimonials Section:
Add 3 positive customer reviews.

acceptanceCriteria: Exactly 3 testimonial entries are shown.
Testimonials are positive, relevant to jewellery laser cutting, and written in English.

requirements.text: Add an FAQ section that includes the four provided questions and clear English answers aligned with the business (time to cut, custom designs, starting price, bulk orders).

quotes:
FAQ Section:
- How much time does cutting take?
- Do you accept custom designs?
- What is starting price?
- Do you take bulk orders?

acceptanceCriteria: FAQ includes all 4 questions exactly as listed.
Each question has a visible answer in English (accordion or similar is acceptable).

requirements.text: Add a Contact section including: business name, location (Etawah, Uttar Pradesh), primary phone number (7906968141), WhatsApp number (8126108743), a simple Get Quote form (name, phone, message), and a Google Maps embed for Etawah, Uttar Pradesh.

quotes:
Contact Section:
Location: Etawah, Uttar Pradesh
Add Google Maps integration.

acceptanceCriteria: Contact section displays Etawah, Uttar Pradesh and both contact numbers clearly.
A Google Maps embed (iframe) is rendered and responsive on mobile.
Get Quote form is present with at least: Name, Phone, Message fields.
Submitting the form does not require external email services; it should provide a usable action (e.g., opens WhatsApp with a prefilled message to 8126108743 and/or shows a confirmation message).

requirements.text: Implement a sticky WhatsApp button that remains visible while scrolling and opens WhatsApp chat to 8126108743; also ensure click-to-call is available in the header/hero and contact section via tel:7906968141.

quotes:
Add sticky WhatsApp button.
Add click-to-call feature.

acceptanceCriteria: Sticky WhatsApp button is visible on mobile and desktop without obstructing core content.
Sticky WhatsApp button opens WhatsApp chat to 8126108743.
At least two click-to-call entry points exist (hero CTA and contact section) using tel:7906968141.

requirements.text: Add on-page SEO and technical SEO for local search: set page title, meta description, Open Graph tags, canonical URL placeholder, and include the target keywords naturally in headings/sections; also add JSON-LD structured data for a local business using the provided business name and location.

quotes:
SEO Optimization:
Optimize website for keywords:
"Gold Laser Cutting in Etawah"
"Jewellery Laser Cutting in Etawah UP"
"Best Gold Cutting Shop in Etawah"
"Laser Jewellery Cutting Near Me"

Make it rank on Google for local jewellery laser cutting searches.

acceptanceCriteria: HTML head includes a meaningful title and meta description referencing Gold Laser Cutting and Etawah.
Target keywords appear naturally in visible page copy (no keyword stuffing) and at least one H1/H2.
Open Graph tags are present for title/description (and image if available).
JSON-LD LocalBusiness (or similar) is present and includes name: Gold Laser Cutting and address locality: Etawah, region: Uttar Pradesh, country: India.
All user-facing text remains in English.

requirements.text: Add smooth animations and modern scrolling effects across sections (e.g., fade/slide-in on scroll, subtle hover transitions) while respecting performance and accessibility (reduced motion support).

quotes: Add smooth animations and modern scrolling effects.

acceptanceCriteria: At least 4 major sections animate into view on scroll with subtle, consistent motion.
Interactive elements (buttons/cards) have smooth hover/focus transitions.
If the user prefers reduced motion, animations are minimized/disabled (prefers-reduced-motion).

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets (logo + luxury placeholders) into the frontend and use them in the hero and gallery to reinforce the premium brand feel.

quotes:
Gallery Section:
Add image placeholders for jewellery cutting samples.
Theme: Black and Gold luxury theme.

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
Hero includes a brand mark/logo and/or a subtle luxury background image.
Gallery uses the generated placeholder images for consistent visual quality.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Frontend must use React + TypeScript with Tailwind and compose (not edit) any read-only UI components under frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not edit immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
No external databases or third-party auth providers; Internet Identity only if authentication is introduced (not required for this request).
Google Maps integration must be done via a simple embed (iframe) unless the user provides an API key later.
nonGoals: Building a multi-page CMS/admin dashboard for managing gallery/testimonials.
Implementing server-side blogging or automated backlink/SEO campaigns ("rank on Google" is addressed via on-page/technical SEO only).
Collecting leads via external email/SMS services (not supported).
Real-time chat or WhatsApp API automation.
